annotations.openshift.io/description: A super-user that can perform any action in the cluster. When granted to a user within a project, they have full control over quota and membership and can perform every action on every resource in the project.
A user that has edit rights within the project and can change the project's membership.
A user that can create and edit most objects in a project, but can not update the project's membership.
A user who can view but not edit any resources within the project. They can not view secrets or membership.
A user that can get basic information about projects.
A user that can request projects.
A user that can get basic cluster status information.
Grants the right to pull images from within a project.
Grants the right to push and pull images from within a project.
Grants the right to build, push and pull images from within a project.  Used primarily with service accounts for builds.
Grants the right to deploy within a project.  Used primarily with service accounts for automated deployments.
